name: The Incredible Hook
description:
A small crystal that can launch a grappling hook! Use grappling hooks to move forward from one Hook point to another to reach a new place. How far can you go?

Controls

  • Space or W for The Button input
  • Gamepad's right buttons work too

Team:

Art, UI, Audiosr: Sai Prashanth Reddy Nareddy

Level Design, Audios, Documents:Shichen Qian(Luke)

Game Programmer: Pedro  Soares
